section.title:
sales history by customer type
customer types sales history for Sales History by Customer Type
section.para: To view Sales history by Customer Type, select the "Sales History by Customer Type" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Sales history by Customer Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display Sales history for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types. Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in .
Select to display Sales history by Customer Type for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose Sales history by Customer Type you want to display.
Sales history by Customer Type generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Sales history by Customer Type generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Select to include Costs in the display.
Select to include Prices in the display.
Display lists Sales history by Customer Type, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.

section.para: Right-clicking on an Order in the Sales history list enables you to select from the following menu options:
